name: 罗曼·阿姆斯特朗
name_full: 罗曼·阿姆斯特朗 Roman Armstrong
introduction: Overview (1)Height	5' 9" (1.75 m)Mini Bio (1)Roman Armstrong(Rome Strong) born on May 16, 2000 in Alexandria, Louisiana he always found himself in the spotlight. As a fifteen year old he began acting in the short film 'On Our Own'(2015) he wrote, produced, and directed. Colliding talent with his best friend since elementary(Justin Carmouche), they established their co-owned production company 'Rome and Mouche Productions' c. 2015.As they continued to create mini-movies, the 'I'm Starving'(2016) short film, broke wild for the internet. The eye opening film allowed a business trip to New York City attending the 'All American High School Film Festival' in 2016. Armstrong winning the eye of producers and production companies, his sophomore year high school, to be awarded as an 'Official Drama Nominee'.While creating his 'short films' in high school he also featured in his high school musicals: Guys and Dolls(2015) he acted as a gambler and featured dancer, featured as 'Rocky' in Damn Yankees(2016), and As 'Monsieur Dark' in Beauty and the Beast(2018).Now as professional, he began to work in the industry as an intern to better his cinema given abilities and on set etiquette.Today, he is known for his work on Roots(2016 - History Channel), Class Rank(2016 - Netflix), Looking for Alaska(Hulu), Queen and Slim(2019 Universal pictures), Queen of the South(2019 - Netflix), and Queen Sugar(2019 - Hulu).
